title: It's about time
creator_credit: British Information Services and Danny Carter
brief_description: This film presents some extravagant or unusually designed historic time-pieces. Captures the ingenuity of horologists and craftsmen seen at work in a large factory producing clocks and watches on a mass production line. Commentary by Frank Hawkins.
description: This film presents some extravagant or unusually designed historic time-pieces. Captures the ingenuity of horologists and craftsmen seen at work in a large factory producing clocks and watches on a mass production line. Commentary by Frank Hawkins.
